brewery.brewery_description:
Rarotonga Brewery is the third iteration of the same brewing company that was brought to Rarotonga in the mid 1990s. Whilst the brewing process has not changed in decades the technological developments have been absolutely amazing especially in terms of temperature control. We have invested in this technology and this will enable us to make a great product consistently.

We service our customers by Keg and tap delivery to bars and restaurants. We also sell to the public in 2 litre stainless steel Flagons that are double skinned with sealable lids. These are a great product as well and are a game changer in terms of the way people buy and carry their beer on the island. By staying away from glass bottles it has become a better option for those who are weary and conscious of landfill waste. When you consider the logistics of getting a beer from Mexico or Italy or Japan or wherever and delivering it to a bar in Rarotonga for 5 or 6 bucks it is an amazingly efficient process. We know that in order to compete with that our job is to make a great beer that Visitors appreciate and our Locals are proud to call their own.     We can do that and that's our commitment.

A few establishments on the island have already jumped at the opportunity to have our top quality craft beer on tap at their establishments. If you have a thirst and a taste for good beer, check out the Rarotonga Brewery opposite Oasis in Nikao or ask for it at all leading bars and restaurants.

venue.venue_name: Sanctuary at Rarotonga Beach Resort and Spa

beer.beer_description:
The Rarotonga Brewery is proud to present it's most famous drop "Cook Islands Lager"

This crisp refreshing lager is brewed in very cold temperatures to ensure a clear pale amber colour with a medium sized white head delivering mild bitterness and sourced from the finest ingredients.
You know what?

It's easier if you just come down and try it for yourself!!

items.badge_description: Fresh air and great beer — a perfect combo. Celebrate your adventure with the exclusive Love Hiking badge, brought to you by Athletic Brewing Co. and Oboz Footwear. Both proud B Corps, these brands are committed to protecting the outdoors and inspiring every step of your journey. Earning this badge also qualifies you for one (1) entry in the Beer Gear: Love Hiking Giveaway sponsored by Athletic Brewing Co. and Oboz Footwear. Terms and conditions apply, click here for more details.
Your quest to quench your thirst leaves no stone unturned! That's at least 65 distinct venues!
You're exploring this great country the best way possible, one delicious beer at a time! That's one beer while in at least 15 states or countries. Visit 5 more for Level 4!

Looking for more kick than a session beer, but want to be able to stay for a few rounds? You have to keep it in the middle. That's 330 beers with an ABV greater than 5% and less than 10%.  Try 5 more for Level 67!
After a long day, what better way to kick back than with a crisp and refreshing lager? You're already feeling more relaxed, aren’t you?. That’s 10 different Lagers! Try 5 more for Level 3!

items.checkin_comment: Wish was in Raro drinking this but still tastes 👍, aromas of sweet straw, pours pale like apple juice color, lite body which be good for tropical heat, crisp floral notes, tiny dry, with a peppery slight bitter finish. Goes down easy
